longBusinessSummary: Braemar Shipping Services Plc provides shipbroking, financial advisory, logistics, and engineering services to the shipping and energy industries. Its Shipbroking segment is involved in the tanker chartering for crude oil, liquefied petrochemical gas, and liquefied natural gas; specialized tankers; sale and purchase projects; dry cargo; offshore chartering, sale, and purchase; and the provision of research, valuation, and derivatives brokerage services. The company's Financial segment provides transaction advisory, financing advisory and capital raising, asset and loan management, and restructuring and insolvency advisory services. Its Logistics segment offers port and liner agency, hub agency, freight forwarding, ship to ship transfer, ship track, and customs clearance services. The company's Engineering segment provides technical advisory; project management and inspection; survey and inspection; LNG cargo system and fuel systems design; newbuilding and conversion of liquefied gas ships, liquid bulk, and dry bulk ships; regulatory support; due diligence; and operational support and optimization services. It operates in the United Kingdom, Singapore, the United States, Australia, Germany, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Braemar Seascope Group plc and changed its name to Braemar Shipping Services plc in June 2007. Braemar Shipping Services Plc was founded in 1842 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
